posts.title: Pet Spider Costume
posts.content: Transform your cute pet into an adorable arachnid by getting them into the Halloween spirit with this pet spider costume. Designed for small pets weighing up to 15 pounds, this wacky getup features eight furry legs that you can position any way that you want.

posts.title: Samsung Curved 49-Inch Gaming Monitor
posts.content: It only takes a few minutes in front of the Samsung CHG90 curved 49-inch gaming monitor to never want to leave your room again. This ultra wide QLED monitor features a 3,840 x 1,080 resolution along with an impressive 32:9 aspect ratio.

posts.title: Inflatable Sumo Surf Suit
posts.content: Experience the watery ride of your life by going down a wave inside this inflatable sumo surf suit. This brightly colored suit envelops you in a bouncy float that makes you completely buoyant so that you can glide with ease over the water’s surface.

posts.title: Smartphone Controlled RoboRoach
posts.content: Take the first steps into the world of advanced neurotechnologies with this smartphone controlled RoboRoach. The kit allows you to be able to wirelessly control the movement of a roach by micro-stimulation of the nerves in their antennae.

posts.title: Gold Playing Cards
posts.content: Up the ante without sacrificing a single chip next time you deal a game with the gold playing cards. This luxurious deck of cards – fit for King Midas himself – come coated with a custom gold paint job that is perfect for a adding a little class to game night.

posts.title: Remo Over-The-Door Smart Camera
posts.content: The Remo wire-free over-the-door smart camera can easily be mounted on any residential door within seconds without having to drill any holes or mess with your electrical wiring. It’s Wi-Fi enabled and captures a 160° peripheral field of view of its surroundings.

posts.title: Artisan Meat Subscription Box
posts.content: Satisfy your inner carnivore like never before by signing up for this artisan meat box delivery service. You’ll receive a specially curated box each month jam packed with top-notch cured meats made from the world’s foremost artisans.

posts.title: Arcade Light Switch
posts.content: Add some color and whimsy to your home with these nostalgic arcade style light switches. These arcade light switches are great for game rooms or kids rooms, but look especially great in your parents basement that you still live in at the disturbing age of 38.

posts.title: Time Magazine Man Of The Year Mirror
posts.content: Give yourself a little confidence boost when you’re down on your luck by looking into this Time Magazine “man of the year” mirror. This 9″ x 12″ Dude-approved mirror is crafted from plastic with a stylish faux wood frame and is the perfect addition for any bedroom, mancave, or bar.

posts.title: Sledgehammer Battering Ram
posts.content: Smash your way through virtually any obstacle you encounter using the sledgehammer battering ram. The inventive design incorporates multiple tools into a simple and incredibly versatile package that you can carry with ease.

posts.title: 50 Cent Hidden Blade Coin
posts.content: Forget lucky pennies, it’s the 50 cent hidden blade coin that’ll really help you out when you’re in a jam. Concealed within this seemingly run-of-the-mill currency lies a razor sharp steel blade that you can discreetly carry virtually anywhere.

posts.title: Self-Propelled Mechanical Models
posts.content: Get a better understanding of the principles of mechanics through the self-assembly of these modular mechanical models. The kit comes with everything necessary for you to transform single pieces of laser-cut plywood into complex moving structures.
